title: IAM Password Policy Security Configuration
description: Configuration schema for comprehensive IAM password policy security enforcement

min_length.title: Minimum Password Length
min_length.description: The minimum length required for passwords

max_password_age.title: Maximum Password Age (days)
max_password_age.description: Maximum number of days a password can be used before it must be changed

min_password_reuse_prevention.title: Minimum Password Reuse Prevention
min_password_reuse_prevention.description: Minimum number of previous passwords that cannot be reused

require_user_password_changes.title: Require User Password Changes
require_user_password_changes.description: Whether users must be allowed to change their passwords
